7.heading: our luxury suites
7.text: Enjoy sublime Dalmatian coastal views from your private balcony in each of our 308 newly redesigned contemporary rooms. Choose from plush ensuite single and double rooms in fresh, neutral tones, or quietly grand suites with an extra large private terrace. Be pampered with a wide range of facilities, 24-hour room service, and free, fast wifi. Complete seclusion, privacy and exclusive luxury are the hallmarks of the VIP wing at Hotel Dubrovnik Palace.
